name: [color=#00884E]JAPPY-34[/color]
text: Welcome [color=#87EA00]biological being[/color], I’m a [color=#00884E]JAPPY-34[/color] unit. If it wasn’t for you would already be [color=#C60000]266 days[/color] since I don’t see any other living being. Thank you for [color=#00884E]visiting me.[/color]

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I am a [color=#87EA00]human[/color], right now I am on a mission. Who dug [color=#C60000]those graves[/color]?

name: [color=#00884E]JAPPY-34[/color]
text: The last of [color=#87EA00]your species[/color] I saw they had returned with the intention of recovering the life they had on the planet. But one by one they [color=#C60000]turned off[/color], leaving me to [color=#00884E]live alone again[/color].

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: Sorry to [color=#1240AB]hear that[/color], those [color=#FFAA00]ZAP-37[/color] units are still working?

name: [color=#00884E]JAPPY-34[/color]
text: They [color=#FFAA00]turned off[/color] a week ago after the last [color=#87EA00]human[/color] went far away from here.

name: [color=#00884E]JAPPY-34[/color]
text: Thanks for [color=#00884E]interacting with me[/color], can I store [color=#1240AB]your name[/color]?

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text:
My real name is [color=#C60000]A-1209[/color], but you can call me 
[color=#1240AB]Argos[/color].
